description: Apple-inspired note-taking app with glass morphism design, local storage, and intuitive navigation

userStories.title: Glass morphism design system
userStories.description: As a user, I want the app to have an Apple-inspired glass morphism design with transparent backgrounds and soft shadows.
acceptanceCriteria: CSS variables for glass backgrounds (light/dark mode)
CSS variables for glass borders with transparency
Three-tier shadow system (small, medium, big) with inset highlights
userStories.notes: Completed. Variables in styles/variables.css. Glass applied to page.css and AppWindow.css

userStories.title: GlassButton component with variants
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a reusable button component with multiple style variants for consistent UI.
acceptanceCriteria: Danger variant (red accent for delete actions)
Unstyled variant (no background, light grey hover)
Colored variants: only opacity changes on hover

userStories.title: AppWindow layout with three-section header
userStories.description: As a user, I want a consistent app window layout with organized header sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Three-section header using CSS Grid (left, middle, right)
Left: Window controls, sidebar toggle, back button (conditional)
Middle: App title (always visible, shows 'New Page' or page title)
Right: Settings, Done, More, Delete buttons (conditional)

userStories.title: Collapsible sidebar with date grouping
userStories.description: As a user, I want a collapsible sidebar that organizes my notes by date.
acceptanceCriteria: Desktop: Collapsible sidebar (fully closed when collapsed, no sneak peek)
Date-based grouping (Today, Yesterday, Previous 7 Days, etc.)
New note button next to each group title

userStories.title: Note CRUD with IndexedDB storage
userStories.description: As a user, I want to create, read, update, and delete notes that persist locally.
acceptanceCriteria: Create notes via button or Cmd+N keyboard shortcut
Notes stored in IndexedDB with Page structure (id, title, blocks, timestamps)
Auto-save on navigation, ESC key, Back/Done buttons
Manual save with Cmd+S keyboard shortcut
Delete via swipe or header button with confirmation
Auto-close editor if deleted note was active
userStories.notes: Completed. Storage in utils/storage.ts, store in stores/pageStore.ts

userStories.title: Swipe-to-delete on sidebar note items
userStories.description: As a user, I want to delete notes by swiping on sidebar items (like Apple Notes).
acceptanceCriteria: Delete button fixed to right edge (doesn't slide with item)

userStories.title: ListView with responsive grid
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see all my notes in a responsive grid layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Date metadata positioned at bottom of card
Empty states for no notes and no search results

userStories.title: Search with yellow shadow highlighting
userStories.description: As a user, I want to search notes and see matching text highlighted.
acceptanceCriteria: Yellow shadow text highlight (not block background)
Group titles show search query with highlighting
userStories.notes: Completed. Highlight in utils/highlightText.tsx, styles in styles/utilities.css

userStories.title: Keyboard shortcuts system
userStories.description: As a user, I want keyboard shortcuts for common actions.
acceptanceCriteria: Platform-aware: cmd works on Mac (metaKey) and Windows (ctrlKey)
Browser conflict prevention (capture phase event listeners)
Input-safe (doesn't trigger when typing, except Escape)
Editor shortcuts: ESC (save and go back)
userStories.notes: Completed. Hook in utils/keyboardShortcuts.ts, hooks in hooks/useGlobalShortcuts.ts and hooks/useEditorShortcuts.ts

userStories.title: Editable note title in TopBar
userStories.description: As a user, I want to edit the note title directly in the top bar.
acceptanceCriteria: Save on blur or Enter key
Update first block content when title changes

userStories.title: Voice input functionality
userStories.description: As a user, I want to input notes using voice.
userStories.notes: Button exists but functionality not implemented

userStories.title: Rich text formatting
userStories.description: As a user, I want to format text with bold, italic, underline, etc.
userStories.notes: Buttons exist but functionality not implemented

userStories.title: More options menu
userStories.description: As a user, I want additional options for notes via a menu.
acceptanceCriteria: Actions: Share, Export, Duplicate, Move to folder
userStories.notes: Button exists but menu not implemented

userStories.title: Note export functionality
userStories.description: As a user, I want to export my notes to different formats.

userStories.title: Search in note content
userStories.description: As a user, I want search to find text within note content, not just titles.
acceptanceCriteria: Highlight matching text in search results
